javafx.beans.value

Interface ObservableIntegerValue

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Observable, ObservableNumberValue, ObservableValue<java.lang.Number>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntegerBinding, IntegerExpression, IntegerProperty, IntegerPropertyBase, JavaBeanIntegerProperty, ReadOnlyIntegerProperty, ReadOnlyIntegerPropertyBase, ReadOnlyIntegerWrapper, ReadOnlyJavaBeanIntegerProperty, SimpleIntegerProperty

    public interface ObservableIntegerValue
extends ObservableNumberValue
    An observable integer value.
    See Also:
    ObservableValue, ObservableNumberValue
